snippet: Peter Hoffman's downtown restaurants will be celebrating crabs with pop-ups in the Rockaways on Saturday, Aug. 18, and again on Aug. 25.
abstract: Peter Hoffman's downtown restaurants will be celebrating crabs with pop-ups in the Rockaways on Saturday, Aug. 18, and again on Aug. 25.

headline.main: Back Forty to Serve Crabs on the Rockaway Boardwalk
